name: arbitrum-dex
description: Arbitrum DEX collector for Uniswap V3 swaps and GMX V2 position events via configurable RPC WebSocket.

jobs.name: stream
jobs.description: Maintain WebSocket connection to Arbitrum RPC for real-time Uniswap V3 swaps and GMX V2 position events.

jobs.name: collectSwaps
jobs.description: Fetch recent Uniswap V3 swap events via eth_getLogs and persist into mod_arbitrum_dex.swaps.

settings.description: Arbitrum WebSocket or HTTPS RPC URL (Infura, Alchemy, etc.)
USD threshold to flag large swaps/positions
JSON array of Uniswap V3 pool addresses on Arbitrum (WETH/USDC, WETH/USDT, WBTC/WETH)
Enable GMX V2 position event collection
